languages.text: "То, как Крударах наткнулся среди звезд на корабль мон-кай и был заражен неизлечимой скверной, с которой не справилась даже воля предков. Как совет принял решение собрать на челноки тех, кто остался, и рассыпаться по галактике в поисках спасения. И как сами провидцы направили наш мир навстречу гибели".

traits.locale_text: "То, как Крударах наткнулся среди звезд на корабль мон-кай и был заражен неизлечимой скверной, с которой не справилась даже воля предков. Как совет принял решение собрать на челноки тех, кто остался, и рассыпаться по галактике в поисках спасения. И как сами провидцы направили наш мир навстречу гибели".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and became infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."
languages.original_text: "То, как Крударах наткнулся среди звезд на корабль мон-кай и был заражен неизлечимой скверной, с которой не справилась даже воля предков. Как совет принял решение собрать на челноки тех, кто остался, и рассыпаться по галактике в поисках спасения. И как сами провидцы направили наш мир навстречу гибели".

traits.locale_text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and was infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council decided to gather put those who remained on the shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Seers themselves who steered our world towards its downfall."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我了解到，克鲁达拉赫在群星之中遇到了一艘猴子的舰船，随后感染了某种无法治愈的腐化，甚至连我们先祖的强大意志都无法将其击退。在那之后，议会决定把所有留在穿梭机上的人召集起来，让他们前往银河系各地，寻找安全的避难所。那个时候，正是我们的先知，亲手将我们的世界指向了灭亡之路。”
languages.original_text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and became infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."

traits.locale_text: “我了解到，克鲁达拉赫在群星之中遇到了一艘猴子的舰船，随后感染了某种无法治愈的腐化，甚至连我们先祖的强大意志都无法将其击退。在那之后，议会决定把所有留在穿梭机上的人召集起来，让他们前往银河系各地，寻找安全的避难所。那个时候，正是我们的先知，亲手将我们的世界指向了灭亡之路。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and became infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."

languages.text: «Descubrí que Crudarach se encontró con una nave mon-keigh entre las estrellas y quedó infectada con una corrupción incurable que ni tan siquiera la voluntad de los ancestros pudo rechazar. Que, después, el Consejo decidió reunir a los supervivientes y enviarlos en lanzaderas por toda la galaxia en busca de un lugar seguro. Y que fueron los propios videntes quienes empujaron a nuestro mundo a su final».
languages.original_text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and became infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."

traits.locale_text: «Descubrí que Crudarach se encontró con una nave mon-keigh entre las estrellas y quedó infectada con una corrupción incurable que ni tan siquiera la voluntad de los ancestros pudo rechazar. Que, después, el Consejo decidió reunir a los supervivientes y enviarlos en lanzaderas por toda la galaxia en busca de un lugar seguro. Y que fueron los propios videntes quienes empujaron a nuestro mundo a su final».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我は、クルダラが星々の間でモン＝ケイの船と遭遇し、不治の腐敗に侵され、父祖の意志でさえ克服できなかったことを知った。評議会はその後、残った人々をシャトルに集め、安全を求めて銀河をばらばらに彷徨うことを決定した。そして、我々の惑星を破滅へと導いたのは、先見司たち自身であったことを知ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and became infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."

traits.locale_text: 「我は、クルダラが星々の間でモン＝ケイの船と遭遇し、不治の腐敗に侵され、父祖の意志でさえ克服できなかったことを知った。評議会はその後、残った人々をシャトルに集め、安全を求めて銀河をばらばらに彷徨うことを決定した。そして、我々の惑星を破滅へと導いたのは、先見司たち自身であったことを知ったのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe erfahren, dass Crudarach in den Sternen einem Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff begegnet ist und mit einer unheilbaren Verderbtheit belegt wurde, die selbst der Wille der Ahnen nicht überwinden konnte. Dass der Rat dann entschied, jene zu versammeln, die noch auf Shuttles waren, und sich auf der Suche nach Sicherheit in der Galaxis zu verteilen. Und dass es die Runenpropheten selbst waren, die unsere Welt in ihren Niedergang lenkten."
languages.original_text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and became infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe erfahren, dass Crudarach in den Sternen einem Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiff begegnet ist und mit einer unheilbaren Verderbtheit belegt wurde, die selbst der Wille der Ahnen nicht überwinden konnte. Dass der Rat dann entschied, jene zu versammeln, die noch auf Shuttles waren, und sich auf der Suche nach Sicherheit in der Galaxis zu verteilen. Und dass es die Runenpropheten selbst waren, die unsere Welt in ihren Niedergang lenkten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai appris que Crudarach avait rencontré un vaisseau mon-keigh parmi les étoiles et qu'il avait été infesté par une corruption incurable que même la volonté des ancêtres n'a pas pu endiguer. Le Conseil a ensuite décidé de rassembler les survivants dans des navettes pour les envoyer aux quatre coins de la galaxie en quête d'un refuge. J'ai également découvert que ce sont les Grands Prophètes eux-mêmes qui ont conduit notre monde à sa perte. »
languages.original_text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and became infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai appris que Crudarach avait rencontré un vaisseau mon-keigh parmi les étoiles et qu'il avait été infesté par une corruption incurable que même la volonté des ancêtres n'a pas pu endiguer. Le Conseil a ensuite décidé de rassembler les survivants dans des navettes pour les envoyer aux quatre coins de la galaxie en quête d'un refuge. J'ai également découvert que ce sont les Grands Prophètes eux-mêmes qui ont conduit notre monde à sa perte. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarach'ın yıldızların arasında ilerlerken bir mon-keigh gemisine denk geldiğini öğrendim. Crudarach, burada atalarımın iradesinin bile karşısında güçsüz kaldığı, çaresi olmayan bir yozlaşmanın istilasına uğramış. Öyle ki Konsey, geride kalanları mekiklere doldurarak güvenli bir yer arayışıyla galaksinin dört bir yanına yayılmaya karar vermiş. Yani bizzat Ötezenler, dünyamızı çöküşe yönlendirmiş."
languages.original_text: "I learned that Crudarach ran into a mon-keigh vessel among the stars and became infested with an incurable corruption that even the will of the ancestors was powerless to overcome. That the Council then decided to gather those who remained on shuttles and scatter across the galaxy in search of safety. And that it was the Farseers themselves who steered our world toward its downfall."

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach'ın yıldızların arasında ilerlerken bir mon-keigh gemisine denk geldiğini öğrendim. Crudarach burada atalarımın iradesinin bile karşısında güçsüz kaldığı, çaresi olmayan bir yozlaşmanın istilasına uğramış. Öyle ki Konsey, geride kalanları mekiklere doldurarak güvenli bir yer arayışıyla galaksinin dört bir yanına yayılmaya karar vermiş. Dünyamızı çöküşe yönlendirenler de böylece Ötesezenler olmuşlar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
